effect.ruby_sapphire: User’s type changes according to the terrain. Terrain | New type -------------- | -------------- Building | normal Cave | rock Desert | ground Grass | grass Mountain | rock Ocean | water Pond | water Road | ground Snow | ice Tall grass | grass In Pokémon Battle Revolution: Terrain | New type -------------- | -------------- Courtyard | normal Crystal | rock Gateway | water Magma | rock Main Street | normal Neon | normal Stargazer | rock Sunny Park | grass Sunset | ground Waterfall | grass

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Alters the POKéMON’s type depending on the location.
flavor_text.emerald: Alters the POKéMON’s type depending on the location.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Alters the user’s type depending on the location’s terrain.
